definition: to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent

sentences.english: Are the Chinese more generous than the Irish?
sentences.chinese: 中國人比愛爾蘭人更古道熱腸？

sentences.english: Thanks to kindhearted bus drivers that day, they did not go on strike.
sentences.chinese: 那天多虧了古道熱腸的公交車司機們，他們沒有罷工。
沒有要攪得我古道熱腸煩。

sentences.english: She loved his brilliance and his generous heart.
sentences.chinese: 她深愛他的才華橫溢和古道熱腸。
